security: The text is redacted because the public disclosure of the redaction could reasonably be expected to constitute an unwarranted invasion of personal privacy, and that invasion of privacy would be so substantial that it outweighs the public interest.
summary: This document is a collection of payroll records for Mary Susan Grimes, an employee of the House Select Committee on Assassinations (HSCA), including payroll authorization forms, a certificate of relationship to members of Congress, and low earnings reports.
summary_one_paragraph: This collection of documents pertains to the payroll of Mary Susan Grimes, an employee of the House Select Committee on Assassinations (HSCA). It includes payroll authorization forms detailing her appointments, salary adjustments, and termination, spanning from January 1977 to December 1978. The records also include a certificate confirming Grimes' lack of familial relationship to any current member of Congress, as well as low earnings reports for unemployment compensation purposes. These documents provide a snapshot of Grimes' employment history with the HSCA, including her earnings, position titles, and relevant dates.
title: HSCA Staff Payroll Records for Mary Susan Grimes
recipient: Clerk of the House of Representatives
